title: Trigger master-branch optprof runs periodically
body: Today, optprof collection from (internal-only link) https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_release?definitionId=1370&view=mine&_a=releases runs for every `vs*` build but not for `master` builds. We should run it on some schedule--not every build. Maybe weekly?

nodes.body: Now set to run every week on Fridays at 3pm PST.
